summary: Implemented a SafeImage component with onError fallback swapping and updated siteContent image paths; pages now use SafeImage for book covers and author portrait. Potential remaining risk: the updated author portrait path contains spaces and may still not resolve correctly in production depending on the actual filename under frontend/public and URL encoding/case.

missing_requirements.requirement: All image filenames referenced in code match the exact filenames present under frontend/public (including case sensitivity) and resolve to actual static files (no 404s), including the author portrait image.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff updates the portrait path to a URL containing spaces ("/assets/Jeffrey Butler profile image.png"), which commonly causes production static-file resolution issues unless the underlying file path exactly matches and the server handles spaces/encoding as expected. The diff does not provide evidence that the referenced filename is web-safe or that a matching static file exists under frontend/public.
